<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1129750_banking_bank_account</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>bank account</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 if (current.interest_rate == null) {
        current.interest_rate = 0.02; // Default interest rate of 2%
    }

    // Set default minimum balance requirement if not provided
    if (current.min_balance_requirement == null) {
        current.min_balance_requirement = 100; // Default minimum balance requirement
    }

    // Set default withdrawal limits if not provided
    if (current.daily_withdrawal_limit == null) {
        current.daily_withdrawal_limit = 5; // Default daily withdrawal limit
    }

    if (current.monthly_withdrawal_limit == null) {
        current.monthly_withdrawal_limit = 20; // Default monthly withdrawal limit
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-30 03:56:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d03eb12747db35103b6e1916926d4385</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bank account</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Banking System" source="x_1129750_banking">6d06c113475bf1103b6e1916926d4361</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Banking System">6d06c113475bf1103b6e1916926d4361</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d03eb12747db35103b6e1916926d4385</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-30 06:39:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d03eb12747db35103b6e1916926d4385"/></record_update>
